doc.field: FOOTHILL GROUP FGI> COMPLETES DEBT PLACEMENT

The Foothill Group Inc said its Foothill Captial Corp unit completed the placement of 23 mln dlrs in senior debt and 27 mln dlrs in senior subordinated debt. Goldman, Sachs and Co privately placed the debt with a group of institutional lenders, the company said. It said the senior debt will bear a 9.4 pct interest rate and the senior subordinated debt will bear 10.15 pct.
Reuter
